attributes.action: REVERSE the mentality of punishing people for succeeding
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems that people who actually do something for themselves and improve their personal situation are constantly attacked by increasing taxes.
This has got to stop, otherwise people will either emigrate or do nothing and live on State benefits.
Reduce taxes, remove bureacracy and petty regulations

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/richpoorsanity/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
